headline: Apple had a head start with M1 but they’re falling behind in Single Core perf
description:
Apple turned the industry upside down with the M1 at the end of 2020 but we’re almost halfway through 2022 and the new M1 Ultra has the same single core performance as the M1 from 2020.

The flagship Intel Alder Lake is already +20% faster than the M1 Ultra in single core. The M2 comes out at the end of this year at the earliest and it will be based on the A15 architecture from iPhone 13, which was 10% faster in single core over the A14, which the M1 is based on.

Do you guys think Apple is in trouble when Intel gets their stuff together and makes their chips more efficient?
headline_zh-Hans: 苹果在M1方面有领先优势，但他们在单核香水方面已经落后了。
headline_zh-Hant: 蘋果在M1方面有領先優勢，但他們在單核香水方面已經落後了。
description_zh-Hans:
苹果在2020年底推出的M1颠覆了整个行业，但我们在2022年几乎已经过半，新的M1 Ultra的单核性能与2020年的M1相同。

旗舰英特尔Alder Lake的单核性能已经比M1 Ultra快了+20%。M2最早在今年年底问世，它将基于iPhone 13的A15架构，其单核速度比M1所基于的A14快10%。

当英特尔振作起来，使其芯片更有效率时，你们认为苹果会有麻烦吗？
description_zh-Hant:
蘋果在2020年底推出的M1顛覆了整個行業，但我們在2022年幾乎已經過半，新的M1 Ultra的單核性能與2020年的M1相同。

旗艦英特爾Alder Lake的單核性能已經比M1 Ultra快了+20%。M2最早在今年年底問世，它將基於iPhone 13的A15架構，其單核速度比M1所基於的A14快10%。

當英特爾振作起來，使其芯片更有效率時，你們認為蘋果會有麻煩嗎？
